cleaned_text: Most modern medications have high contents of chemicals and ingredients that can cause additional side effects during your illness. At Ramos Chiropractic, we recommend homeopathy as an alternative medicine to treat mental, emotional, and physical illnesses. Discover the Healing Power of Homeopathic Medicines Homeopathic medicines are natural remedies that are made from natural sources, such as plants and minerals. Homeopathic medicines are safe for everyone in your family. Homeopathy should not be confused with herbal medicines or other types of natural medicines. Homeopathic Medicines to Treat Your Illness - Cold - Ear infection - Migraine - Sore throat - Asthma - Depression - Autism - Arthritis Differences between Homeopathy and Conventional Medicine Homeopathy is an effective natural treatment that is based on stimulating one's own immune system to initiate the healing process. It believes that if a substance causes a symptom in a healthy person, giving the person a very small amount of the same substance may cure an illness. In conventional therapy, the aim often is to control the illness through regular use of medical substances, even if the medication is nothing more than vitamins. It helps to control the symptoms of a disease.
